company: 睿控網安股份有限公司
description:
About TXOne
TXOne Networks provides cybersecurity solutions for ICS and OT environments using the OT zero trust methodology. We collaborate with top manufacturers and infrastructure operators to develop practical defense strategies that eliminate security vulnerabilities in industrial settings. TXOne ensures the availability of industrial systems by mitigating cybersecurity challenges that can disrupt operations. Our solutions empower customers to benefit from networked control systems while maintaining operational resilience, personnel safety, and asset security. TXOne Networks is honored to be named one of the top-10 Hottest IoT startup by CRN in Jul 2024.

Job Summary
We are seeking a highly motivated and skilled Embedded Software Engineer to join our team. In this role, you will be responsible for the low-level software development and hardware integration of our embedded systems. You will play a crucial part in porting SDKs, adapting hardware, configuring bootloaders, and developing essential device drivers. The ideal candidate will possess a strong understanding of operating system internals, hardware architectures, and embedded software development practices.

Key Responsibilities
-	Board Support Package (BSP) Development: Design, develop, and maintain BSPs for various hardware platforms. 
-	Hardware Porting: Adapt operating systems and software to new or modified hardware. 
-	SDK Porting: Integrate and port Software Development Kits (SDKs) to target hardware. 
-	Bootloader Configuration: Configure and customize bootloaders, such as GRUB, for optimal system startup. 
-	Device Driver Development: Develop, port, and optimize network drivers and other kernel modules. 
-	Kernel Customization: Modify and configure the Linux kernel to meet specific hardware and software requirements. 
-	System Integration: Collaborate with hardware and software teams to ensure seamless system integration. 
-	Debugging and Troubleshooting: Diagnose and resolve complex hardware and software issues. 
-	Documentation: Create and maintain comprehensive technical documentation.


Equal Opportunities Statement
TXOne is committed to promoting equal opportunities and creating a workplace that is free from discrimination based on personal characteristics such as race, gender, age, religion, or any other protected characteristic. We welcome and encourage all qualified candidates to apply, and we are dedicated to providing fair and inclusive hiring processes for all applicants. We will continue to review and improve our policies and practices to ensure that we maintain an ongoing commitment to diversity and inclusion.
other:
Essential Skills: 
·        Proven experience in embedded systems development using x86 and/or ARM64 architecture
·        Strong proficiency in C/C++ programming.
·        In-depth understanding of Linux kernel architecture and device driver development.
·        Experience with bootloaders (e.g., GRUB, U-Boot, secure boot).
·        Experience with network driver development.
·        Experience with Kernel module development.
·        Experience with hardware porting.
·        Experience with SDK porting.
·        Familiarity with hardware interfaces (e.g., UART, SPI, I2C, PCIe, USB, GPIO).
·        Excellent debugging and problem-solving skills.
·        Strong communication and teamwork abilities.

Preferred Skills: 
-	Experience with DPDK is a plus.
-	Experience with embedded Linux distributions (e.g., Yocto Project, OpenWRT).
-	Experience with version control systems (e.g., Git).
-	Experience with embedded system debugging tools.

company: Trend Micro_趨勢科技股份有限公司
description:
The XDR capabilities of Trend Micro’s Vision One platform provide context-aware of the investigation, recording, and reporting of system-level activities. It collects detailed activity data from kernel mode, user mode, and/or native system events across multiple security layers, including endpoint, servers, cloud workloads, email, and networks.

Search Data Lake plays as one key component to process hundreds of billions of activity data collected from Trend Micro Endpoint products per day and collect detection logs from different TrendMicro products. We also provide solutions for internal applications to efficiently discover the potentially infected endpoints.

Requirement:

2.Strong programming experience in C/C++ with a focus on performance-critical systems.

Responsibility:
1.Work closely with stakeholders for requirement discussion, cross-team integration and troubleshooting.
2.As a full-cycle developer responsible for delivery of features from planning, design, implement, test, deploy and operate.
3.Automate and improve development and release processes.
  
Big Plus
1.Familiar with public cloud technology in Azure and/or AWS
2.Experience with high-performance computing (HPC) or numerical computing.

Personality:
1.Good teamwork and problem-solving skills.
2.Aggressive working attitude.
3.Willing to take challenges and take actions with agility.
4.Staying with the newest technologies.

job_name: 演算法工程師(電腦視覺開發)
company: 晶睿通訊股份有限公司_台達電子集團
description:
我們相信攝影機是感知真實世界最有效的感測器，就像大自然的生物演化出視覺能力一樣
因此將AI融入攝影機，讓它能夠自動分析真實世界的各種活動
這樣一來，使用者可以快速獲得對真實世界的理解，並藉此做出最佳的決策和行動

我們正在尋找具有創造力和熱情的AI研發人才，以下是團隊的特色與文化：
1.學習型組織：我們鼓勵團隊成員不斷學習，樂於分享與交流新知識與技術。我們相信持續學習是成長和創新的基石
2.Kanban開發流程：我們使用Kanban開發流程，讓我們的研發成果能夠快速傳遞給客戶。透過資訊輻射，我們的團隊成員能夠擁有全局視野，並在其中主動發現和協助其他成員一起克服挑戰
3.園丁式的領導方式：管理者採用園丁式的管理方式，讓團隊成員可以根據自己的興趣和專長進行研發，創造出對客戶最有價值的成果。我們重視每個成員的個人發展，並提供相應的支持和培訓
4.貼近使用者：我們與使用者保持緊密的溝通，了解他們的痛點，並致力於解決客戶所面臨的問題。這種貼近客戶的思維使得我們的研發成果能夠更有效地滿足客戶的需求，團隊夥伴們也因此獲得成就感與樂趣
5.開放溝通：通過定期與不定期的一對一的對話，團隊成員可以更清楚地了解領導層的策略和目標，同時，我們也歡迎團隊成員提出自己的想法和目標，實現從下至上的創新思維
6.建立心理安全感：我們重視團隊成員的心理安全感，鼓勵他們勇於創新，不怕失敗，挑戰現狀。我們相信只有在一個充滿信任和支持的環境中，才能夠發揮最大的潛力

工作內容：
電腦視覺演算法研究與程式開發

如果你也認同一個鼓勵不斷學習、挑戰現狀、傾聽使用者、互助合作來解決客戶痛點的研發團隊，誠摯地邀請你加入我們！
other:

1. Familiar with C/C++.
2. Knowledge in digital image processing and computer vision

Preferred Requirements:
1. Familiar with OpenCV is a plus.
2. Knowledge in machine learning is a plus.
3. Familiar with linear algebra is a plus.
4. Experience in deep learning framework (Caffe, Caffe2, TensorFlow , PyTorch, Keras, , CNTK, MXNet, Theano, Torch,...) is a plus.
5. Experience in embedded system is a plus

job_name: Machine Learning Engineer (CV) 機器學習工程師 (電腦視覺)(24013102)
company: 叡揚資訊股份有限公司
description:
### Qualifications

- Master’s degree or equivalent practical experience.
- Familiarity with machine learning development frameworks (PyTorch / HuggingFace / PyTorch Lightning, etc.).
- Experience in Python, SQL, Git, and Web API frameworks ( Flask / FastAPI, etc.).
- Experience in developing machine learning projects.
- Strong teamwork and communication skills.

### About The Job

Hi there, we, DCS (Department of Cognition and Sensing) teams, are built up of Data sciences / Machine Learning (ML) talents and architecture engineers who have passion and ideas for trying new stuff. We are focusing on pioneering new approaches to enhance existing services while simultaneously working towards creating novel solutions. The aim is to provide customers with intelligent office services, leveraging AI or, technically say, "machine learning," to improve their workflow and save valuable time. What a wonderful world, right? :-)

We are seeking those who are interested in Computer Vision (CV) and Multi-modal research. In the realm of CV, numerous image processing requirements exist in various industries. Our team develops ML solutions utilizing deep learning and CV algorithms, including Optical Character Recognition (OCR), Key Information Extraction (KIE), Layout Analysis, and Visual Search. Additionally, we're interested in challenging projects such as visual question answering and multi-modal applications. We are devoted to applying these intelligent solutions to practices.

All of these research and development will corporate with different business groups. You have lots of opportunities to accumulate various experiences from each project. We also encourage you to attend technical conferences to learn new stuff. Moreover, all members in DCS have chances to share your ideas and experiences with our stakeholders and whole members of GSS. If you are interested in machine learning development and like to implement it in real world, DCS is one of the good places for you :-)

### Responsibilities

- Design and develop ML solutions, packaging them into APIs for different projects.
- Stay updated on the latest SOTA (State-of-the-Art) and novel research papers and relevant developments.
- Collaborate with other business groups to design suitable requirements for customers.
- Optimize ML solutions and deploy them to local/cloud devices with various hardware capabilities.

company: 睿控網安股份有限公司
description:
About TXOne Networks
TXOne Networks provides cybersecurity solutions for ICS and OT environments using the OT zero trust methodology. We collaborate with top manufacturers and infrastructure operators to develop practical defense strategies that eliminate security vulnerabilities in industrial settings. TXOne ensures the availability of industrial systems by mitigating cybersecurity challenges that can disrupt operations. Our solutions empower customers to benefit from networked control systems while maintaining operational resilience, personnel safety, and asset security. TXOne Networks is honored to be named one of the top-10 Hottest IoT startup by CRN this Jul.


Job Summary
As a TXOne AI Engineer in AI team, you will be part of a high performance team that focuses on ICS and OT Cybersecurity solutions. We are seeking a highly skilled AI Engineer to work with product/security team in developing advanced AI-driven security solutions. The ideal candidate will bring a deep understanding of machine learning (ML), deep learning (DL), and Generative AI (GenAI) concepts, with a strong ability to implement practical applications. This role involves designing and implementing models that can process and analyze data derived from various sources, including files and network packets. The successful candidate will possess strong hands-on coding skills, proficiency in AI frameworks such as TensorFlow or PyTorch, and experience in transforming raw data into actionable model inputs for predictions and inference.

Key Responsibilities
Your role may be in one or more of these areas:
•	Research and select the most suitable machine learning or deep learning models based on use-case requirements, data patterns, and performance needs.
•	Develop and deploy AI/ML models tailored for security applications, ensuring they can accurately interpret and process data from diverse sources such as files and network packets.
•	Design and optimize preprocessing pipelines to transform raw data into high-quality input for AI models.
•	Collaborate with security experts to understand data patterns, threat vectors, and operational requirements, applying this understanding to enhance model design.
•	Develop tools to visualize, test, and validate AI model performance and ensure they meet security industry standards.
•	Collaborate with the engineering team to integrate AI models into security products, ensuring reliable performance and scalability.
•	Stay up-to-date with the latest advancements in AI, ML, and security technologies, recommending improvements to maintain a competitive edge.

Why TXOne Networks?
-	Shape the Future: Be part of a team that’s at the forefront of Networking Security technology.  
-	Collaborative Environment: Work with dynamic and talented professionals who are passionate about innovation.
-	Impactful Role: Play a critical role in driving the success of our groundbreaking products.

Ready to make your mark in Networking Security? Join TXOne Networks and be a catalyst for the future of connectivity!


Equal Opportunities Statement
At TXOne Networks, we embrace change, empower people, and encourage innovation in a connected world. Our diversity and multicultural workforce are key contributing factors to our success across the globe. We like to have fun while taking our culture seriously. We are an equal opportunity employer and are committed to this regardless of race, colour, religion, sex, nationality, age, citizenship, sexual orientation, marital status, gender identity or veteran status. We do not allow discrimination or harassment of any kind.
other:
Requirements
•	Master’s degree or above in Engineering, Computer Science, Information Technology, and or related field or equivalent experience.
•	Strong coding skills in Python, or similar languages, with an emphasis on applying these skills to data processing and model deployment.
•	Proven experience with AI frameworks such as TensorFlow, PyTorch, or equivalent, with hands-on knowledge in building and tuning models.
•	Solid understanding of machine learning and deep learning techniques, including supervised and unsupervised learning, neural networks, and GenAI.
•	Familiarity with common data transformation, feature extraction, and data engineering techniques.
•	Experience working with real-time and batch processing of data.
•	Strong problem-solving skills, particularly in model design and optimization.
•	Ability to work collaboratively within a team environment and effectively communicate complex technical concepts.
•	Experience in processing and analyzing data from files and network packets, with the ability to transform data into suitable input for AI models is a plus.
•	Experience in the security industry or knowledge of security data is a plus.

Build a data platform for the retail industry using cloud service architecture. You will work closely with the infrastructure team to ensure the stability of the retail group's data platform and seamlessly integrate the data platform with cloud services to create a real-time and business-oriented data environment. 【Job Description】This position is part of the Data Center Team.

4. Develop APIs for data and model services and optimize the CI/CD development and deployment processes to ensure data security and scalability.

Skills Requirements:

【Skills】

2. Familiarity with relational databases (SQL and NoSQL) and their usage and development.
3. Proficiency in Python programming.
4. Familiarity with Spark, Kafka, Containers, Docker development.
5. Proficiency in cloud data pipeline and DevOps pipeline development.

2. 喜歡思考、邏輯性佳、對分析與零售相關工作有熱忱、有開放學習的心態與團隊合作的精神。

【加分技能】

【Personality Traits】

job_name: 科技部_Data Engineer 數據工程師
company: 美好證券股份有限公司
description:
關於美好證券：
大慶證券於1988年成立，2003年成為上櫃公司，淨資產46.42億元。歷年來秉持「踏實穩健、正派經營」的經營理念，為客戶提供各種金融服務，除了證券交易，還包括投顧、承銷、自營、期貨、信用交易等業務。目前員工人數約400人，在全台灣共有12個營業據點，分佈於北區8處、中區2處、南區2處。併入亞洲價值資本集團後，全新的大慶證券整合了集團多元的金融服務能力，增加資產管理的服務，透過有競爭力的資產管理產品與專業可靠的投資顧問，為客戶與股東創造更多、更完整的價值。
於2022年我們更名為美好證券，英文名稱定為「GOOD FINANCE SECURITIES CO., LTD.」，這提醒我們「該追求的不只是富裕，而是美好，富裕只是工具」，全新品牌名稱將更貼近公司核心價值並強化發展願景。


【職位概述】
結合先進數據工程、分析與AI技術，致力於打造智能產品。藉由深度洞察，強化投資、產品與顧問核心能力。創造長期價值。將大數據分析轉化為可行洞察，提供即時與高品質的決策支持。持續支持公司數據化、AI化的運轉體系創新

身為 Data Engineer，負責設計、建置與維運 數據基礎設施 (Data Platform)，確保數據流通、處理與存取的自動化、穩定性與效能。透過高效的數據平台與自動化技術，提升數據應用價值，支持公司所有的數據、AI專案，支援公司業務增長、決策優化與 AI 應用。


【主要職責】
我們正在尋找細心、有責任感、熱愛數據並充滿好奇心的 Data Engineer，透過先進的數據工程，打造高效且可擴展的數據基礎建設，支持公司 DATA/AI 產品與服務的發展，並為內外部客戶提供高滿意的數據驅動成果，支持創造客戶、創造價值

1. 數據管線開發、監控與維護
- 設計、開發與維運 ETL / ELT Pipeline，收集整合內部與外部異質數據源，確保數據的品質、穩定性與可擴展性
- 數據建模 (Data Modeling)，確保數據架構符合業務需求與最佳實踐，提升查詢與運算效能
- 建立數據監控與告警機制 (Alerting & Monitoring)，確保數據管線穩定運行，即時偵測異常並優化數據流程

2. 數據產品開發與業務賦能
- 與各部門用戶 (User)、Data Scientist 深入合作，理解業務需求並設計適合的數據解決方案
- 設計並建置自動化商業分析 Dashboard 與追蹤系統，支持業務、產品發展與戰略決策，驅動數據產生商業價值

3. 數據平台 (Data Platform) 建置與維運
- 管理、部署與維護數據平台 (Data Platform)，確保高可用性與穩定性，支援 AI/數據產品開發
- 優化數據計算資源 (Spark, Presto…)，確保高效計算與儲存管理 (Data Lake, Data Warehouse)
- 建置數據治理 (Data Governance) 工具，確保數據質量、安全性與監管合規性

4. 數據系統監控與效能優化
- 數據遷移與架構優化：監測與分析數據系統與資料庫效能，進行數據遷移、性能調校與架構調整，確保系統穩定性與可擴展性。
- 優化查詢效能：縮短數據處理時間，提高系統查詢與運算效率
- 針對異常數據流或系統問題，提供有效的修復與最佳化方案

5.  MLOps / 數據工程 DevOps
- 與 Data Scientist 合作，部署與管理機器學習模型，確保模型能在生產環境穩定運行
- 建立與優化 MLOps 工作流程，提升模型的部署自動化、監控與維護，確保 AI 產品快速迭代
- 自動化數據與模型部署 (CI/CD)，確保數據工程與 AI 產品能夠穩定、高效地運行

【任職資格】
學經歷
- 學士以上，主修資訊工程、計算機科學、數據科學、應用數學、統計學、軟體工程或相關領域
- 2~5 年以上，數據工程 / 大數據 / 數據平台相關開發經驗
- 具備金融數據應用經驗或相關證照尤佳

跨部門溝通與問題解決能力
- 具備良好溝通能力，能與 Data Scientist、跨部門團隊協作，推動數據應用落地
- 解決問題能力強，能針對數據異常、系統瓶頸進行診斷與優化

數據工程與管線技術
- 熟悉 ETL / ELT Pipeline 設計，能處理異質數據與 Batch / Streaming Data
- 熟悉SQL / NoSQL 數據庫 (PostgreSQL, MongoDB)
- 熟悉 Spark, Presto, Kafka 等大數據計算框架

監控、最佳化 DevOps/MLOps
- 具備數據系統監控、查詢效能優化經驗
- 熟悉 CI/CD、自動化數據部署
- 熟悉機器學習模型部署與 MLOps 流程，與Data Scientist 合作進行模型管理與監控


【我們提供】
•  接觸價值投資的先進理念和實踐經驗，藉由金融成就美好人生
•  加入一個開放、好學、有夢想的團隊，跟志同道合的人一起工作
•  在專業領域嘗試和創造的廣闊空間，親歷金融科技變革的前沿

英業達近年進攻各種 AI 邊緣運算應用領域。我們是英業達 AI 晶片設計研發團隊，具備多年 AI 與 Processor IC 設計經驗，現正積極投入類神經網路加速器 IP 研發。其中所有軟硬體皆 in-house 獨立自主研發，2023 年推出已被數家台灣知名上市 IC 設計公司採用，市場需求踴躍；2024年也於兩家上市 IC 設計公司的 AI 高整合晶片達到 First Cut Work 目標，並通過系統性驗證。現正積極擴大招募新血。歡迎對高效能 AI 邊緣運算有熱誠的朋友加入！

Job Title: Robot and vision Backend Software Engineer (Robotic Arm, Camera, AI Integration)

Job Overview:
We are looking for a skilled Backend Software Engineer to integrate robotic arms, cameras, and AI systems, focusing on development within ROS2 and Linux environments. This role will design and build efficient backend services to support robot control, perception, and AI-driven decision-making, with optimization for deployment on x86 and Nvidia Jetson embedded platforms. 
The product's goal is to develop automation control systems, applied in industrial automation and logistics robots, providing an efficient and stable software platform.

Responsibilities:

Design and develop backend systems based on the ROS2 framework, integrating robotic arm and camera drivers.
Develop and optimize software services in a Linux environment to ensure efficient communication and data processing.
Optimize performance and deploy systems on Nvidia Jetson platforms.
Develop APIs and interfaces to support real-time control and data exchange.
Collaborate with hardware and AI teams to achieve system integration and automation.
Skills Required:

Proficiency in ROS2 development and Linux environment with 2+ years of backend development experience.
Familiarity with robot control, camera drivers, and image processing, with experience in OpenCV.
Strong programming skills in C++ and Python.
Knowledge of Docker container technology and microservices architecture.
Experience with Nvidia Jetson platform or embedded system development.
Preferred:

Experience with robotic arm control or automation system development.
Expertise in AI model integration and optimization.

現階段，我們正積極聚焦於 AI 應用開發，包含資料處理、AI 模型訓練與部署，持續投入前沿技術研究，打造能深刻改變企業效能與客戶體驗的關鍵產品與服務。

•實時監控系統績效並調整參數，持續提升整體運行效率
5.持續創新與技術探索
•研究並實驗最新 AI/ML 技術
•提出創新解決方案，打造更具競爭力的平台與服務
 
【在這裡，你能獲得什麼？】

•開放友善的團隊文化：自由分享知識與想法，互相支援、共同進步，迸發更多可能性。
 
如果你對資訊技術的無限發展有強烈熱情，渴望用 AI 與軟體技術帶動企業創新與價值提升，歡迎加入 大聯大控股資訊服務處，和我們一起實現企業競爭力的飛躍！

job_name: ESDA (Enhanced Software for Defect Analysis) Engineer
company: 台灣美光(台灣美光晶圓科技股份有限公司/台灣美光記憶體股份有限公司/美商美光亞太科技股份有限公司台灣分公司)
description:
Job Description
ESDA(Enhanced Software for Defect Analysis)is the system used at Micron Technology, Inc., to categorize fails coming from the tester based on their pattern, size and location within the die. ESDA is used to identify defects detected during wafer fabrication responsible for tester fails as well. As a Product Yield Analysis (PYA) ESDA Engineer at Micron Technology, Inc., your primarily responsibilities will be setup ESDA for new products, maintain and enhance ESDA systems, drive alignment across fabs on how ESDA data is collected, stored, analyzed and reported. Additionally, you will be responsible for communicating and coordinating ESDA activities with various Departments (Design, Product Engineering, Test, YE, RDA and IT).

Responsibilities include but are not limited to the following:

ESDA setup for new products

Ensure ESDA is available for all DRAM and NAND parts before first Silicon reaches Probe.
Verify that setup is correct and ESDA data is available to YE groups.
Enable ESDA on new technology and new test data.
Maintain ESDA System

Monitor Micron’s current ESDA system for problems in its ability to collect complete and accurate data in a timely fashion.
Be a central point of contact for customer problems with ESDA.
Identify root cause of ESDA problems quickly and solve or contact and work with responsible department to solve.
Forecast future needs for ESDA system and be pro-active in addressing.
Improving ESDA System

Identify opportunities to leverage ESDA data for yield improvement and reliability improvement.
Improve ability to use ESDA for defect matching for feedback to RDA and YE.
Create Engineering software tools for ESDA analysis and product line monitoring.
Work with FA groups on tactical issues involving ESDA analysis to understand current usage.
Alignment

Drive for alignment across fabs on how ESDA data is collected, stored, analyzed and reported.
Help in establishing common company-wide criteria for measuring performance of ESDA system.
Work with other departments/sites on prioritizing ESDA related projects (with timelines and deliverables).
Facilitate meetings across departments to get input and consensus on improvements/fixes to ESDA.
Required Qualifications:

Experience with memory products in one or more of the following areas:
Proficiency in at least one programming language, preference for C, C++, Python.
Familiar with OOP concepts and implementation.
Familiarity with web development beneficial (html, javascript, css, Angular)
Familiar with source control (Git, Jira, Jenkins).
Excellent problem-solving and analytical skills.
Ability to work in a fast-paced environment and communicate effectively (written and verbal) across multiple locations and teams.
Strong skills in communicating complex technical ideas/concepts.
Education:

BS Computer Engineering or equivalent college degrees.

company: 台灣美光(台灣美光晶圓科技股份有限公司/台灣美光記憶體股份有限公司/美商美光亞太科技股份有限公司台灣分公司)
description:

Job Description
As an SPC Manger, you are responsible for the effectiveness and efficiency of the SPC program. This includes collaborating with Process Engineering, Process Integration, RDA, and Probe departments to ensure they are adhering to the Micron Quality Standards for Statistical Process Control. Additionally, you are responsible for prioritizing inline parameters that need engineering attention, sourcing variation contributors on critical parameters, providing internal customers with SPC performance metrics, and providing CpK metrics to Micron Corporate to be shared with external customers for review. Implementing SPC Business Process and Best Known Methods.

Responsibilities and Tasks:
1. Establish And Improve Process Condition And Technology.
2. Upgrade Process Capability And Reduce Production Cost.
3. Establish And Modify Process Management Projects.
4. Set Up Process Parameters For A Variety Of Semiconductor Equipment.
5. Evaluation, Promotion And Planning Of New Equipment / Materials.
6. Abnormal Analysis And Improvement.

description:

關於工作
您將加入一家快速成長的人工智慧部門，隨著 AI 模型解決方案需求的增加，我們正擴展團隊並尋找一位充滿熱情的全端工程師，致力於開發高度互動的應用程式和可擴展的後端系統，以滿足多樣化的需求。在這裡，您將有機會拓展技術專業，並深入參與 大語言模型（LLM） 應用的開發與部署，發揮您的技術才華。

工作描述
作為一名全端工程師，您將在設計、開發和維護應用程式的前端和後端中發揮關鍵作用。您的責任包括：
	•	創建用戶友好的網頁界面
	•	開發穩健的後端 API
	•	將 AI 與 LLM（如 ChatGPT、Google Gemini） 整合到應用程式中
	•	確保部署與服務整合的順暢，並優化系統效能
如果您積極主動、擅長團隊合作、擁有出色的問題解決能力，並熱衷於 生成式 AI（Generative AI）與大語言模型（LLM）技術，我們期待與您會面！
職責描述
	•	將 AI 及 LLM 模型打包為應用程式或 API，並負責部署與上線
	•	開發和優化 Retrieval-Augmented Generation（RAG）技術，以提升 LLM 回應品質
	•	設計並優化 LLM Prompt Engineering，提升 AI 回應的準確性與實用性
	•	與 AI 研究團隊合作，將 ChatGPT、Google Gemini 及其他 LLM 部署於應用系統
	•	開發 RESTful API，支援 AI 模型推理及資料檢索
	•	協助優化系統效能，確保穩定性與可擴展性
	•	與跨部門團隊合作，針對專案需求進行技術整合與解決問題

專業能力需求
	•	Python（Flask / FastAPI）
	•	Docker（應用程式容器化部署）
	•	RESTful API 開發
	•	SQL / NoSQL 資料庫（PostgreSQL, MongoDB）
	•	Git（版本控制）
	•	LLM API（如 OpenAI API、Google Gemini API）
	•	Prompt Engineering（AI 指令設計與最佳化）
	•	RAG 技術（檢索增強生成）

加分條件

	•	OpenGL / WebGL

We are seeking a highly skilled and motivated IT Data Engineer to join our team in Taiwan.         - Collaborate with cross-functional teams to integrate data solutions.

【Skills】

        - Strong SQL skills and hands-on experience with Oracle, MSSQL, and PostgreSQL.

3.     Preferred Skills:
        - Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.
        - Effective communication and teamwork abilities.
        - Ability to work in a fast-paced, dynamic environment with attention to detail.

description:
【全球智慧製造】
你知道Garmin的智慧工廠嗎? 你知道火星上出現過Garmin的產品嗎? 你知道飛行員總是配戴Garmin的手錶上天空嗎?

現在就投遞履歷，讓我們見識你的獨特潛力！

【職務內容】 
先進規劃與排程系統的研發是工廠邁向智慧製造的重要里程碑，也是數位轉型過程中的關鍵應用。我們正在尋找一位對工廠作業流程充滿好奇、並具備資料科學專業知識的夥伴，與我們共同推動智慧製造的發展，提升生產效率與運營效益。
 
【必要條件】
熱情：對工廠作業流程與資料科學領域持有積極的學習態度，能夠接受挑戰並不斷尋求創新的方法來改進工廠運營，不斷提升專業知識和技能。
專業知識與理論基礎：具備生產管理與資料科學的專業知識，深入了解生產排程理論及最佳化理論，能夠應用這些理論於實際工廠排程和運營改善中。
合作能力：能夠有效地跨部門合作，確保技術方案的實施與優化

【工作內容】
1. 開發和完善現有先進排程模擬系統，實現高效的生產流程與排程優化。
2. 依據生產目標定義問題、收集資料、分析以及開發演算法以提升整體生產效益 。
3. 監控並維護排程系統的穩定運作，及時解決系統運行中的問題，保證生產排程的連續性和可靠性。
4. 使用資料視覺化工具提供引人入勝的報告和儀表板，清晰展示數據洞見。
5. 協助設計和實施工廠數位轉型計劃，包括評估現有流程和技術，提供改善建議。
6. 協助管理層制定基於數據分析的決策，並追蹤實施結果。
other:
1. 熟悉Python、Julia，並具備實際分析經驗
2. 熟悉SQL語法
3. 熟悉資料視覺化實作（如Tableau）
4. 具備使用離散事件模擬套件的經驗(如SimPy, SimJulia)
5. 理解多種不同類型的最佳化演算法的優化機制與使用時機。(如Genetic Algorithm, Tabu Search, Particle Swarm)
6. 具備多目標最佳化應用的經驗
7. 具備藉由Multi-thread加速最佳化演算法的能力

數位分身是整合3D模型、虛擬人、機器人、AI預測模型和即時數據的先進技術，能在虛擬世界中精確呈現真實世界。Wistron將此技術與實體工廠結合，在虛擬環境中預先模擬未來工廠的運作，優化生產流程，再將成果應用於實際生產中，從而加速設計迭代並顯著縮短調試時間。

欲了解更多部門成果，請參閱：
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=OAdqXZGUb70

https://www.nvidia.com/zh-tw/on-demand/session/aisummit24-stb2/

Isaac Sim/ ROS Robotic 工程師
   - 自動化程式開發、整合與分析，達成虛實同步及遠端控制。
   - 使用ROS於Isaac Sim 中開發及驗證控制系統。

description:
【全球智慧製造】
你知道Garmin的智慧工廠嗎? 你知道火星上出現過Garmin的產品嗎? 你知道飛行員總是配戴Garmin的手錶上天空嗎?

【職責】

作為MES（製造執行系統）系統分析師，您將在國際智能工廠環境中扮演一個關鍵角色，協助實現順暢的生產流程並擔任以下職責：

1. 系統整合與文件管理

- 與各部門密切合作，進行需求訪談，以深入了解生產流程，支援MES系統的順利上線。
- 撰寫關鍵文件，包括系統技術手冊、操作手冊和培訓材料，確保運營的無縫轉變。

2. 國際合作與MES系統移植

- 參與跨國MES系統移植計劃的策劃和實施，促進不同國家工廠之間的協作和信息共享。
- 建立跨國溝通渠道，確保信息流動，以支持項目的成功實施。

3. 參訪接待

- 當參訪團體來工廠參觀時，您將擔任重要的介紹角色，向他們展示我們的智能工廠運營模式。

【要求】

為了在這個職位上蓬勃發展，我們期望您擁有以下特質和能力：

- 具備 MES 系統分析師經驗，並精通相關技術和工具。
- 出色的溝通技巧，具有跨部門協調和國際合作的能力，能夠與不同文化背景的同事合作無礙。
- 專業態度，以認真負責且積極主動的態度處理工作。
- 流利的英語能力，以支持跨國合作和溝通。

【優勢】

加入我們團隊的MES 系統分析師將享有以下優勢：

- 工作範圍多元，包括需求訪談、系統導入、文件編寫、國際溝通和參訪接待等多樣性工作。
- 有機會深入了解和體驗不同國家的文化和生產流程，擴大您的國際視野。
- 工作充滿挑戰，為您提供學習新技能和不斷成長的機會。

【挑戰】

這個職位將帶來以下挑戰，但這些挑戰也將成為您的成長機會：

- 與各部門協調需要優秀的溝通技巧，以確保項目成功實施。
- 跨國合作需要具備一定的英語能力，並需要建立有效的跨文化溝通。
- 應對複雜的工作內容需要具備相應的專業知識和經驗，以應對挑戰並取得成功。

description:
Responsibilities:

Current Context:
Design, develop, and maintain the backend infrastructure for our AI platform, focusing on a multi-agent system architecture.
Develop and optimize prompts for large language models (LLMs) and other AI models.
Implement and manage MLOps/LLMOps pipelines for model training, deployment, and monitoring.
Implement and manage relational (RDB) and NoSQL databases as needed for AI model training and data storage.
Integrate AI models and services with other platform components and applications.
Troubleshoot and resolve AI backend issues, ensuring performance, scalability, and reliability.
Collaborate with Data Engineers, Data Scientists, and other stakeholders to define and deliver AI-powered solutions.
Partner with cross-functional teams globally, communicating platform updates effectively.
Role Briefly: Multi-Agent Systems, Prompt Engineering, LLMOps/MLOps, AI Model Integration, RDB, NoSQL, Backend Development
Expectations for Three Months: Become familiar with our existing technology stacks, not only within your specific role but across the broader data platform ecosystem.
Expectations Within One Year: Contribute to the development of key components of our AI platform, demonstrating expertise in multi-agent systems and prompt engineering. Specific contributions can be discussed.
 
Who We're Looking For
Non-Technical Skills & Mindset:
Impact-Driven & Results Focused:
Value-Oriented: Focused on delivering solutions that generate significant business value (millions USD impact).
Impact Conscious: Prioritizes work with the greatest technical and business impact. A focus on enabling data consumption through API creation is a plus.
Growth & Learning Mindset:
Cross-Functional Learner: Eager to learn and understand cross-functional knowledge beyond core expertise.
Technology Agnostic Learner: Willing to learn new technologies and adapt to evolving landscapes.
Efficient Learner: Able to leverage AI tools to maximize productivity and accelerate learning.
Best Practice Pragmatist: Loves to follow best practices but understands trade-offs and works around limitations when necessary. Demonstrated pro-activeness through contributions to open-source projects is highly valued.

Collaborative & Global Communicator:
Team Player: Collaborates effectively in global team environments. Adaptable and comfortable working within an Agile environment.
Excellent Communicator (English & Chinese): Fluent in both English and Chinese (Mandarin) to effectively communicate with global teams and stakeholders.
Technical Concepts: We're looking for candidates with a strong grasp of:
Fundamental computer science knowledge
Root cause finding methodologies
Systematic/architectural thinking
Clean code/clean architecture principles and an aversion to over-design

Technical Skills:
Python: Proficient in Python, with experience in AI/ML backend development.
SQL: Solid SQL skills for data management and querying.
Cloud Development: Hands-on experience with GCP, including hybrid environments with on-premises DCs. Experience with AWS or Azure is also acceptable.
Multi-agent System, prompt engineering and basic knowledge for machine learning / deep learning.
 
Tech Stacks:
Compute & Hosting: GKE & GCE (RedHat), GCP Cloud Run & Cloud Functions
Data Orchestration: GCP Cloud Composer (Airflow)
Data Lakehouse: BigQuery
Data Streaming: Kafka Ecosystem (Confluent Cloud, Debezium, Qlik)
Monitoring & Observability: GCP Monitoring/Logging/Metrics, OpenTelemetry
CI/CD: GitHub Actions, Jenkins
Infrastructure as Code: Terraform
Security: VPC SC & Policy Tags, Customer-Managed Encryption Keys (CMEK), Vault
Containers: Docker, Kubernetes
Data Governance: Collibra
Data Visualization: Power BI

負責規劃與開發AI 加速硬體對應的編譯工具及SDK 平台，以滿足客戶多樣的深度學習模型/大語言模型LLM/視覺語言模型VLM/多模態模型 MM-LLM 等等AI 應用需求。 

【工作說明】
1. AI 編譯工具的開發與維護。
2. AI 平台的SDK 的開發與維護。
3. AI 模型測試驗證與AI 平台測試驗證。
4. 解決客戶AI 問題、優化AI 效能。
5. AI 算子Lib 與AI 應用Lib 開發，平行運算加速及優化。

【必要條件】
1. 程式語言: 精熟C/C++, 熟悉Python.
2. AI 理論技術: 熟悉深度學習模型, 或機器視覺方面的理論及技術。如果有大語言模型LLM/視覺語言模型VLM/多模態模型MM-LLM/QAT/Prunning 概念與經驗者優先。
3. AI訓練架構: Pytorch, TensorFlow, ONNX, Caffe等至少熟悉一種。
4. AI部署架構: TFLite, ExecuTorch等 Edge AI 量化格式，具有使用與部署經驗者為佳。
5. 系統平台經驗: 具有嵌入式Linux, RTOS 平台開發/使用經驗者為佳；具有多線程、多進程、Arm NEON, CEVA/Cadence DSP, SiFive/Andes RISC-V Vector extension 開發經驗者為佳。
6. 系統理論技術: 熟悉計算機組織與結構、編譯器、平行運算、分散式運算等方面的理論及技術者為佳。
7. 驗證測試: 熟悉自動化驗證流程或具有測試覆蓋率提升相關經驗、測試工具開發技術者為佳。

job_name: 總辦公室 數位暨數據部 Development and Support Specialist
company: IKEA_宜家家居股份有限公司
description:
#電商軟體開發 #網路電商平台系統維護 #線上商務平台
Purpose of Job:
The Development and Support Specialists together form the Digital Product Support Team. The purpose of the job is to secure that all IKEA North Asia’s Digital Products are properly maintained - issues to be addressed in a timely & efficient manner and that every build takes maintenance into consideration so as to maximize operational efficiency.  . 
The Digital Product Development and Support Specialist will be working closely with business user to provide 1st level support on issues reported. He/she will be responsible for the initial investigation to narrow down issue root cause and co-ordinate with the relevant external vendor to provide fix and solution to business user. 
The role will also be working closely with the product development team to ensure knowledge is transferred and well documented for future support. Also, sharing real-life experience to development team to avoid potential operational risk at early stage of the development. 

Job assignment: 
1.Provide 1st level support to business user for all IKEA North Asia Products (Coined under the “Digital Product Suite”). Be the first contact point for all reported issues and respond according to internal SLA. Provide advice, suggestion or workaround solution to reduce impact on business operation. Provide ad-hoc support on P1/P2 issues during non-office hour when needed. 
2.Carry out investigation to identify possible root cause of issue and route ticket to corresponding party or external vendor to apply fix , conduct quality assurance for all provided solution/fixes before they can be accepted and deployed. Support Digital Solution Manager to draft incident report and suggest preventive action when need. 
3.Monitor and follow-up on status of open issues with responsible parties to ensure issue resolution adheres to the Service level agreement. Constantly reviewing and optimizing the support process/SOP to strengthen the product support model and reduce resolution time 
4.Actively evaluate all relevant vendors’ support SLA and ways of working, engage with vendors to continuously optimize such processes to achieve maximum efficiency 
5.Maintain and prepare product support document based on active participation in the development cycle together with knowledge transfer by the product development team. 
6.Participate in product development cycle to provide input from operation support point of view to ensure product meets operation standard and avoid potential operational risk at early stage of the development. 
7.Proactively identify and suggest potential improvement area in the product to reduce issue and improve the product stability.
8.Monitor the product performance base on the agreed metric and escalate if the system fails to comply with the agreed KPI. 
 9.Monitor system to ensure scheduled tasks are performed timely and accurately. Raise support ticket to re-run missed task and recover damage if need.
other:
1. A minimum of 3 years' experience in system support and service delivery role, experience in system development or IT infrastructure support is a plus
2. Good knowledge and experience of supporting customer facing digital solutions including websites, mobile app, data tools and BI tools
3. Knowledge of service delivery and product support, ideally with software development experience and basic knowledge on digital infrastructure. 
4. Experience in an omnichannel retail business model with adopted/internally built digital products, track record of open ticket management and experienced in bridging between business and IT (ie. Business and Technical) on system issues and optimization demands 
5. Hands-on experience in web application(PHP, HTML5, CSS, Vue.js, React.js, Node.js, Responsive Design), mobile apps and basic knowledge in RDBMS (e.g. Oracle, MSSQL, MySQL), NoSQL (e.g. Mongo DB) 
6. Knowledge of using application health and performance monitoring tools (e.g. Fire Base Console, NewRelic, etc…) 
7. Past experience in working with development team and/or in a “DevOps” setup, good exposure to both development and support sides of Digital products
8. Solid Experience working with external technical developers and solution providers

job_name: 【全球智慧製造】產品經理 PM_新店
company: GARMIN_台灣國際航電股份有限公司
description:
【全球智慧製造】
你知道Garmin的智慧工廠嗎? 你知道火星上出現過Garmin的產品嗎? 你知道飛行員總是配戴Garmin的手錶上天空嗎?

全球智慧製造服務計畫(GSMS)透過AI、機構、電控、資料科學、IoT、大數據等技術，將智慧製造系統，即時控制與調整全球生產系統，且在地化支援亞洲、美洲、歐洲多個國家

如果你想體驗不同的文化，綻放自己的光芒！
現在就投遞履歷，讓我們見識你的獨特潛力！

【Job Responsibilities / Role】

      •	Requirement Collection and Prioritization
          o	Communicate with factory users to understand business processes and pain points, translating them into concrete digitalization requirements.
          o	Collaborate with cross-regional teams to consolidate requirements, identifying commonalities and localized needs to ensure system adaptability across different production environments.
          o	Write User Stories / Use Cases to define system requirements and functional objectives, ensuring the development team fully understands the needs.
     •	System Development Collaboration
          o	Participate in Agile development processes, closely working with software development teams to ensure timely delivery of system features.
          o	Collaborate with global development teams to ensure system development aligns with global factory standards while adapting to regional manufacturing processes and IT environments.
          o	Validate development outcomes, ensuring delivered system features meet actual factory needs. Work with the QA team to conduct testing and validation processes.
     •	System Implementation and Training
          o	Plan system implementation strategies to ensure a smooth system rollout, providing internal training and documentation guidance.
          o	Work with global factory teams to ensure the system implementation aligns with each factory’s operational requirements.
          o	Collect user feedback from factory sites, analyze system usage, and plan future iterations and optimizations accordingly.
     •	Data-Driven Decision-Making and Continuous Optimization
          o	Collaborate with data science teams to define system KPIs and leverage data-driven insights to optimize decision-making.
          o	Promote intelligent applications (e.g., equipment anomaly prediction, AI-based quality inspection, automated production reporting) to enhance factory intelligence continuously.

【Required Skills】
 
     •	Proficiency in Scrum/Agile development methodologies, including effective User Story writing and Product Backlog management.
     •	Strong skills in requirement interviews, process analysis, and system planning, capable of converting business needs into actionable development specifications.
     •	Excellent communication skills with development teams, ensuring clear requirement articulation and collaborative problem-solving with technical teams.
     •	Familiarity with Industry 4.0 and digital transformation technologies (e.g., MES, IoT, WMS, Digital Twin, etc.).
     •	Understanding of manufacturing processes and factory automation (e.g., AGV, smart warehousing). Experience in factory operations is a plus.
     •	Ability to communicate and collaborate with international teams, integrating diverse regional requirements to drive global factory standardization.

【Work Experience】
     •	3+ years of software project management experience.
     •	Experience in MES, IoT, WMS, or digital transformation system development is preferred.
     •	Experience working with global factories or development teams, integrating regional requirements to promote global factory standardization.

【Education Requirements】
     •	Bachelor’s degree or above (no specific major required).

【Language Requirements】
     •	English – Listening: Fluent | Speaking: Fluent | Reading: Fluent | Writing: Fluent

company: 大同世界科技股份有限公司
description:
我們正在尋找一位才華橫溢的 AI 工程師加入我們的團隊，為我們的 AI 專案注入新的活力。如果你對 AI 技術充滿熱情，並具備優秀的專案管理、AI 導入與顧問支援、智能客服知識庫建置與維護、提示調整、用戶對話紀錄分析、系統功能測試與優化等能力，那麼這個職缺就是為你準備的！

一	專案管理：
1.	具有跨團隊溝通能力，可流暢與技術、客服、客戶、業務、產品及專案團隊等進行溝 
        通與合作。
2.	具有專案管理經驗，熟悉專案管理流程和工具。
3.	能夠同時管理多個專案，確保按時交付並滿足客戶需求。
4.	撰寫多種文件，包括但不僅限於專案建議書、簡報、使用情境說明、市場分析、機器 
        人服務狀況分析等。
5.	回應客戶提出的問題，並且分析問題，設法解決。

二	AI導入與顧問支援：
1.	理解機器人產品的運作邏輯，規劃並設計AI導入流程與功能。
2.	主動了解客戶需求及應用情境，以顧問角色協助規劃解決方案與對話互動，提升顧客 
        體驗與解決問題。
3.	製作提案或產品相關簡報，必要時使用Clipchamp製作產品影片。

三	智能客服知識庫建置與維護：
1.	負責構建和更新智能客服的知識庫，確保知識庫的內容全面、準確且及時。
2.	定期審核和優化知識庫中的條目，以提升智能客服的回答質量和用戶滿意度。

四	提示調整（Prompt Tuning）：
1.	熟練提示調整技術（Prompt Tuning），善用Prompt來改善AI模型的回答效果。
2.	分析不同Prompt對模型表現的影響，並進行持續的調整和改進。

五	用戶對話紀錄分析：
1.	上線後定期收集和分析用戶對話紀錄，識別常見問題和痛點。
2.	根據分析結果提出改進建議，協助智能客服的優化和功能完善。

六	系統功能測試與優化：
1.	參與智能客服系統的功能測試與優化，確保系統運行的穩定性和可靠性，提升智能客
        服的效率和用戶體驗。

七	數據分析與文書處理：
1.	熟練使用Excel等數據分析工具，進行數據處理和報告撰寫。
2.	善於利用各類文書處理工具，製作專業的報告和文檔，支援日常工作。

八	加分項目：
1.	熟悉大語言模型（LLM）技術，了解基本的AI和機器學習理論。
2.	具備導入AI解決方案的實際操作經驗，尤其是大語言模型（LLM）和檢索增強生成（RAG）技術。
3.	掌握至少一種程式語言。
4.	具備SQL使用能力。
5.	對新技術和新工具有強烈的學習興趣和適應能力，包含但不限於了解市面上的不同AI模型。

job_name: 數位轉型發展中心-AI研發部【Generative AI Engineer】

description:

3. 開發可整合的應用接口，促進AI技術的產品化或滿足專案需求，並持續優化功能與用戶體驗。

4. 管理數據流並佈建相關基礎架構，確保AI部署的高效運行及生產環境的穩定性。

5. 與跨部門團隊緊密合作，從零到一進行概念驗證（PoC）乃至產品研發，不斷探索並提出創新AI解決方案。
other:

1.	熟悉生成式AI相關技術，包括但不限於 LLMs、提示工程（Prompt Engineering）、向量資料庫

3.	熟悉API設計與開發，能夠應用工具如FastAPI進行版本管理與標準化開發

7.	具備良好的問題解決能力，能獨立完成工作並推動項目進展

	加分條件： 
1.	對大型數據集的分塊（Chunking）策略及元數據（Metadata）增強有實際經驗。
2.	具有對 LLM 的模型參數調測及再訓練的實務經驗
3.	有數據科學相關經驗，或具備爬蟲、分散式計算、資料儲存系統等知識

description:

job_name: AI資料科學家 Data&AI Scientist - 集團徵才(數數發中心, DDT)_I00016334
company: 國泰金控_國泰金融控股股份有限公司
description:
【團隊介紹】
我們是一個充滿熱情與創意的團隊，致力於結合科技與數據驅動保險業的創新變革。在這裡，你將與專業的技術與商業團隊協作，打造下一代智能解決方案，推動產險的數位轉型與智能化發展。

我們相信，未來的保險不僅僅是理賠和風險分攤，更是結合數據與AI技術實現全方位的風險預測與預防。

無論是車險理賠自動化、自然災害風險評估，還是風險預防方案，我們不僅在傳統產險領域引入前沿技術，也正在探索保險科技的無限可能。

如果你熱愛結合商業與技術，並希望將創意和洞察力轉化為可落地的AI解決方案，這裡將是你大展身手的最佳舞台！加入我們，與數據和科技共同塑造保險的未來！

【這份工作需要你/妳】
1. AI 與數據模型開發與部署: 獨立完成機器學習與LLM模型的設計、訓練與開發任務，用於預測分析、生成式AI、自然語言處理等業務需求。

2. 數據處理與特徵工程: 從零開始進行數據清洗、特徵工程及分析，確保數據質量與模型效能最佳化。

3. 前沿技術探索與實作落地: 研究最新AI技術（如生成式AI、強化學習等），配合商業應用場景，並主動實驗與推動落地。

4. 技術優化與維護: 監控模型運行效能，進行迭代優化，確保技術方案的穩定性與持續改進。

加入我們，讓你的技術實力發揮影響力，共同推動保險業的智能化轉型！

熟悉資料流架構設計，具備 ETL / ELT 開發經驗。

熟練資料 API 串接設計與實作，有第三方 API 整合經驗。

熟悉資料庫技術（SQL / NoSQL），具備資料庫效能調校及維運經驗。

具備 Python 或 .NET Core的實作經驗，作為主要開發工具。

良好的專案管理與溝通能力，能主動推動專案並與多方協作。

[加分項目]

有分散式架構經驗（如 Kafka、Spark、Kubernetes 等）及其應用經驗。

具備資料安全、權限控管經驗。

有實務雲端資料平台經驗（如 AWS, Azure, GCP）。

有數據治理、資料血緣、品質管理經驗。

曾負責/主導中大型資料專案，具備「從 0 到 1」或「持續優化」的推動能力。

[Summary]

Advantech data platform has already reached a significant scale and is now moving toward the next phase of performance optimization and architectural enhancement. You will join a data-driven team to participate in the construction and optimization of our core data platform, with opportunities to:

Dive deep into large-scale data architectures to tackle challenges in performance and stability.

Proactively identify areas for improvement within existing systems, propose, and implement optimization solutions.

Collaborate closely with cross-functional teams to ensure data services effectively support diverse business needs.

We are looking for an engineer who is detail-oriented, proactive, and capable of driving projects forward—someone who not only delivers but also pushes the team to continuously improve.

[Requirements]
3-5 years of experience in data engineering or related fields.

Familiar with data pipeline architecture design; experience in ETL/ELT development.

Proficient in designing and implementing data API integrations, including third-party API integrations.

Solid experience with database technologies (SQL / NoSQL), including performance tuning and maintenance.

Hands-on experience with Python or .NET Core as primary development tools.

Strong project management and communication skills, with the ability to independently lead projects and collaborate across teams.

[Nice to Have]
Experience with distributed architectures (e.g., Kafka, Spark, Kubernetes) and their practical applications.

Knowledge of data security and access control.

Practical experience with cloud-based data platforms (e.g., AWS, Azure, GCP).

Experience in data governance, lineage, and quality management.

Proven track record in leading or being a key contributor to medium-to-large-scale data projects, with the ability to drive initiatives from the ground up or continuously enhance existing systems.

company: 睿控網安股份有限公司
description:
About TXOne
TXOne Networks provides cybersecurity solutions for ICS and OT environments using the OT zero trust methodology. We collaborate with top manufacturers and infrastructure operators to develop practical defense strategies that eliminate security vulnerabilities in industrial settings. TXOne ensures the availability of industrial systems by mitigating cybersecurity challenges that can disrupt operations. Our solutions empower customers to benefit from networked control systems while maintaining operational resilience, personnel safety, and asset security. TXOne Networks is honored to be named one of the top-10 Hottest IoT startup by CRN in Jul 2024.

Job Summary
Stellar is a pioneering next-generation endpoint protection platform designed explicitly for Industrial Control Systems (ICS), HMI/SCADA, IPC, and other embedded devices in critical infrastructure. It aims to safeguard mission-critical assets, optimize operational efficiency for mass deployment, reduce downtime, and minimize operational costs in large-scale factory environments.  We are seeking a Software Engineer to support the product development. He/She will work closely with customers and support team to provide immediate assistance. Will also work closely with the Product Managers, User Experience Designers, and QA engineers to provide suitable designs product developing cycles. 

Key Responsibilities
•	Conduct research to enhance Linux kernel performance, security, and stability.
•	Develop new features, modules, or patches for the Linux system-level software
•	Collaborate with cross-functional teams to design and implement solutions.
•	Perform system profiling, debugging, and optimization.
•	Document technical processes, findings, and solutions.
•	Stay updated on emerging trends and technologies in the Linux ecosystem.

Why TXOne Networks?
-	Shape the Future: Be part of a team that’s at the forefront of Networking Security technology.  
-	Collaborative Environment: Work with dynamic and talented professionals who are passionate about innovation.
-	Impactful Role: Play a critical role in driving the success of our groundbreaking products.

Ready to make your mark in Networking Security? Join TXOne Networks and be a catalyst for the future of connectivity!


Equal Opportunities Statement
At TXOne Networks, we embrace change, empower people, and encourage innovation in a connected world. Our diversity and multicultural workforce are key contributing factors to our success across the globe. We like to have fun while taking our culture seriously. We are an equal opportunity employer and are committed to this regardless of race, colour, religion, sex, nationality, age, citizenship, sexual orientation, marital status, gender identity or veteran status. We do not allow discrimination or harassment of any kind.
other:
Requirements
•	Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field.
•	At least 2 years programming experience in Linux OS
•	Strong proficiency in C/C++ programming and Linux system programming.
•	Deep understanding of Linux kernel internals, device drivers, and system architecture.
•	Experience with shell scripting, Python, or other scripting languages.
•	Familiarity with version control systems (e.g., Git).
•	Problem-solving and analytical skills with attention to detail.

•	Knowledge of Endpoint cybersecurity concepts would be a plus.
•	Familiarity with performance analysis tools (e.g., perf, strace, valgrind, and ebpf) would be a plus.

company: 遊戲橘子數位科技股份有限公司
description:
我們正在尋找一位對數據與人工智慧充滿熱情的資料科學家，加入我們的數據驅動團隊。若您具備 遊戲產業 或 數位行銷領域 的經驗，將能更快速發揮影響力。您將與行銷與營運團隊密切合作，透過機器學習與統計分析洞察玩家行為與市場趨勢，推動產品優化、營運策略與業務成長。

您將負責的工作內容：

1.深入分析玩家行為與營運數據，找出影響留存、付費、活躍度等核心 KPI 的關鍵驅動因子
2.建構資料模型（如留存預測、玩家分群、推薦系統)，提升體驗並支援營運判斷
3.設計並執行實驗（如 A/B 測試），評估新功能、活動與行銷策略的效果
4.將技術成果轉化為具說服力的數據簡報，清楚傳達給非技術團隊與決策者
5.與工程團隊合作，完成模型部署、監控與效能優化，確保落地應用
6.協助建構與維運資料平台及數據處理流程，包括特徵工程與資料清理
7.運用數據與 AI 技術，提出流程自動化與營運優化的創新解法
other:
【必要條件】
1.統計、資料科學、資訊工程、數學、行銷科技等相關科系學士或碩士學位
2.熟練使用 Python 與 SQL 進行資料分析與機器學習建模
3.熟悉常見機器學習工具與演算法（如 Scikit-learn、XGBoost、TensorFlow 等）
4.熟悉資料視覺化工具，如 Tableau、Power BI、Looker Studio，或 Python 可視化套件（如 Matplotlib、Seaborn）
5.熟悉 Linux 操作環境，能進行日常數據處理與自動化腳本撰寫
6.具備良好的簡報與溝通能力，能將技術分析轉化為具商業價值的洞察
7.能獨立定義問題、設計分析流程，並提出具體可行的解法

【加分條件】
1.曾參與遊戲產業或數位行銷領域的資料分析／AI 專案
2.熟悉遊戲指標與玩家行為分析邏輯（如 DAU、ARPU、LTV、Churn 等）
3.熟悉行銷分析工具（如 Google Analytics、Firebase、AppsFlyer）

5.熟悉以下工具者：Docker、GitLab / Git、Airflow
6.具備兩年以上資料分析／模型開發相關實務經驗

job_name: 科技部_Data Scientist 數據科學家
company: 美好證券股份有限公司
description:
【 關於美好證券 Good Finance 】
大慶證券於1988年成立，2003年成為上櫃公司，淨資產46.42億元。歷年來秉持「踏實穩健、正派經營」的經營理念，為客戶提供各種金融服務，除了證券交易，還包括投顧、承銷、自營、期貨、信用交易等業務。目前員工人數約400人，在全台灣共有12個營業據點，分佈於北區8處、中區2處、南區2處。併入亞洲價值資本集團後，全新的大慶證券整合了集團多元的金融服務能力，增加資產管理的服務，透過有競爭力的資產管理產品與專業可靠的投資顧問，為客戶與股東創造更多、更完整的價值。
於2022年我們更名為美好證券，英文名稱定為「GOOD FINANCE SECURITIES CO., LTD.」，這提醒我們「該追求的不只是富裕，而是美好，富裕只是工具」，全新品牌名稱將更貼近公司核心價值並強化發展願景。


【 職位概述 Summary 】
透過先進的數據工程、分析與 AI 技術 (機器學習/深度學習)，打造高效與穩定的智能演算系統，實現商業與客戶的深度洞察，支持公司 DATA/AI 產品與服務的發展，並為內外部客戶打造高滿意的智能演算系統，支持創新體系運轉，創造價值

身為 Data Scientist (AI Engineering Focus)，聚焦於從資料探索分析、模型訓練開發到部署的整體流程，結合 AI 模型開發與工程落地能力，負責設計並實現可穩定運行的智能演算系統。此角色需與多部門協作，將數據科學成果轉化為可落地的智能服務，同時建立自動化流程、部署模型 API，並持續優化效能與監控機制，驅動 AI 產品走向商業價值落地。


【 主要職責 Job Description 】
我們正在尋找細心、有責任感，對資料與 AI 技術充滿好奇與創新思維的 Data Scientist。你將運用先進的數據工程、機器學習與深度學習技術，開發高效穩定的智能系統，深入洞察客戶與商業需求，推動公司 DATA/AI 產品與服務的進化，並打造高滿意度、可持續運行的智能演算系統，為企業創造可衡量的價值：

1. 跨部門合作，推動 AI 賦能落地
- 與業務、產品、行銷、風控、科技等部門協作，釐清問題、需求與資料可行性，將資料科學成果轉化為可落地的智能服務與數據產品
- 設計具可解釋性的 AI 模型機制，協助業務團隊理解預測輸出、提升 AI 模型的可信度與實用性
- 確保專案成果同時兼顧商業目標、使用者需求與監理合規要求

2. 數據探索、分析與視覺化
- 應用統計分析、機器學習與深度學習方法進行資料探索與假設驗證，支持產品設計、客戶洞察與決策建議
- 使用 SQL、PrestoDB、Spark 等技術處理與清理大規模資料集，提升資料質量與運算效能
- 建立自動化報表與互動式儀表板（如 Tableau、Streamlit、Metabase），促進數據在業務端即時應用

3. AI 模型訓練與系統整合，驅動智慧應用
- 針對具體商業場景，設計、訓練與整合合適的機器學習/深度學習模型
- 執行特徵工程、演算法評估與驗證流程，確保模型的穩定性、效能與可解釋性
- 開發並維護模型服務 API，支援模型對內外部系統的即時串接與應用

4. 系統化部署與模型優化 (MLOps)
- 與 Data Engineer 合作，將模型部署至生產環境，並確保其長期穩定運行與可監控性
- 使用 MLflow 等工具建立 ML pipeline，實現模型訓練、自動測試、監控與版本管理
- 優化推論效能與系統資源使用，並依據資料分布與需求進行定期 retraining 與模型升級

5. 技術研究與內部技術擴散
- 持續追蹤並實踐最新 AI/ML 演算法、工具與框架
- 參與技術競賽或外部社群，推進團隊研發實力與對外能見度
- 推動內部技術分享、撰寫技術文檔與最佳實踐，提升團隊整體工程與 AI 能力"

【 任職資格 Key Qualifications 】
｜學經歷｜
- 資訊工程、統計、應用數學、人工智慧或相關科系學士以上學歷
- 至少 2 年以上資料科學或機器學習相關工作經驗
- 具備金融數據應用經驗或相關證照尤佳

｜專業領域能力｜
- 熟悉資料前處理、特徵工程、模型訓練與評估流程
- 熟悉機器學習/深度學習框架，如 Scikit-learn、PyTorch、TensorFlow 等
- 具備 RESTful API 設計與模型部署經驗，能將模型封裝為服務
- 有 ML pipeline/MLOps 導入與實作經驗（如 MLflow、CI/CD）
- 熟悉 Docker、GitLab CI、容器化部署與模型版本管理
- 良好的跨部門溝通能力，能與業務、產品、工程團隊有效協作

｜人格特質｜
- 細心
- 團隊合作
- 創新思維
- 對數據與 AI 技術充滿熱情
- 自主學習能力佳，樂於擁抱新技術

【 我們提供 】
- 接觸價值投資的先進理念和實踐經驗，藉由金融成就美好人生
- 加入一個開放、好學、有夢想的團隊，跟志同道合的人一起工作
- 在專業領域嘗試和創造的廣闊空間，親歷金融科技變革的前沿

job_name: R0007222: Software Development Engineer in Test (NWES)
company: Trend Micro_趨勢科技股份有限公司
description:
Overview
In the roles of Software Development Engineer in Test, the individual will be responsible for testing tasks related to Trend Vision One Endpoint Security. This position is deeply integrated into every aspect of the software development life cycle, including the testing of network features such as network sensor, Intrusion Prevention System, and Firewall.

As a Software Development Engineer in Test, you will work closely with architects, developers, and project managers to develop high-quality products. Additionally, you will need to drive the testing strategy and collaborate with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality software solutions.

Responsibilities
· Test Strategy: Collaborate with cross-functional teams to understand project requirements and develop comprehensive test plans.
· Test Design: Create and execute test strategies, cases, and scripts to validate software functionality, performance, reliability, and security.
· Testing Excellence: Perform various types of testing, including functional, regression, integration, and performance testing, to identify and address defects.
· Automation: Develop and maintain test automation frameworks, tools, and infrastructure for efficient and effective testing.
· Cross-functional Collaboration: Work with development and product management teams to ensure timely and high-quality software releases.


Qualifications/Requirements
· Bachelor’s degree in computer science, engineering, or equivalent industry experience.
· In-depth knowledge of software testing methodologies, tools, and processes.
· Experience in programming languages such as Python, PowerShell, and Linux shell scripting.
· Familiarity with version control systems (e.g., Git) and CI/CD processes.
· Experience with Infrastructure as Code (e.g., Ansible, Terraform).
· Experience with automation tools (e.g., Selenium, Playwright).
· Understanding of network protocols.
· Active learner who is self-motivated and proactive in solving problems independently.
· Good English communication skills.

Experience Required
· 2+ years of test automation experience.
· Implementation and maintenance experience in a CI integration environment (e.g., Jenkins, GitHub, or Ansible).
· Familiarity with cloud platforms such as AWS or Azure.
· Familiarity with VMware vCenter environments.

company: 台灣英飛凌科技股份有限公司
description:
The Intern Program in Taiwan is a 1-year program designed to provide a comprehensive and engaging experience for interns, while also cultivating a mindset among managers to develop and nurture emerging talent within the organization. The program will start from 1 July and will focus on building a strong foundation for interns to grow and develop their skills, with the goal of retaining high-potential interns as internal employees.

Role Overview:

We are looking for an enthusiastic intern to join our software team, focusing on Bluetooth/BLE features for IoT and automotive products. This role offers the chance to work on exciting projects and collaborate with various teams across different locations.

Responsibilities:

In your new role, you will:
•	Bluetooth/BLE Development: Implement and maintain Bluetooth/BLE software features for IoT and automotive products.
•	Technical Issue Solving: Help solve technical issues related to Bluetooth.
•	Team Collaboration: Work with hardware, firmware, and field application engineers (HW, FW, FAE teams) in various locations for all aspects of projects.

Qualifications:

You are best equipped for this role if you:
•	Fourth-year university / Second-year master students or Current graduates
•	Programming Skills: Are familiar with the C language.
•	Technical Skills: Have software development, testing, and troubleshooting skills.
•	Platform Experience: Experience with Linux, Android, or Windows programming is a plus.
•	Personal Attributes: Are independent, self-motivated, and willing to learn.

Learning Opportunities:

•	Bluetooth/BLE Knowledge: Gain deep insights into Bluetooth/BLE software features for IoT and automotive products.
•	Technical Problem Solving: Develop skills in solving technical issues related to Bluetooth.
•	Collaborative Projects: Learn to work collaboratively with HW, FW, and FAE teams across different locations.
•	Software Development: Gain hands-on experience in software development and troubleshooting on various platforms.

This internship is perfect for someone eager to learn and contribute to Bluetooth/BLE software development for innovative IoT and automotive products. If you're passionate about technology and looking for hands-on experience in a supportive team environment, we encourage you to apply.

company: Advantech_研華股份有限公司
description:
職務介紹
We are seeking a skilled GMSL (Gigabit Multimedia Serial Link) Camera Software Developer on NVIDIA Jetson platform to join our team. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in camera system development, including control, calibration, stereo-to-depth algorithms, and video synchronization.

主要工作內容
1. Develop and maintain software to control GMSL camera systems, ensuring optimal performance and reliability.
2. Design and implement calibration algorithms to enhance camera accuracy and image quality.
3. Develop stereo-to-depth algorithms to extract depth information from stereo camera setups.
4. Ensure precise synchronization of video streams from multiple cameras.
5. Collaborate with cross-functional teams to integrate camera systems into larger platforms.
6. Troubleshoot and resolve issues related to camera software and hardware.
7. Participate in all phases of SDLC including requirements gathering, design, code, test, and code/test coverage.
8. Develop embedded software for NVIDIA Jetson devices.

人才需具備
1. Proficiency in programming languages such as C and C++.
2. Experience in camera system design, including ISP drivers, color science, and image/video processing algorithms. 
3. Familiarity with stereo vision and depth extraction techniques.
4. Understanding of video synchronization methods for multi-camera systems.
5. Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
6. Excellent communication and teamwork abilities.

description:

作為全球資訊安全領域的領導者，趨勢科技為你提供絕佳的學習與成長平台。我們的團隊遍佈全球，你將有機會與各地的工程師共同合作，從專案初期規劃到產品全球佈署，參與每一個環節。

•寫出能影響數百萬用戶的程式，並親眼見證自己的代碼如何改變世界？

company: 科林儀器股份有限公司
description:
關於這個職位
我們專注於企業內的數據分析與應用（包括醫療、銷售、財務等），提供整體的營運方向、風險評估及軟體產品的增值應用，提升數據應用的價值。我們目前正在尋找一位專業的資料工程師，協助我們推動醫療數據領域的創新工作。您將負責開發、維護及優化我們的數據基礎設施，確保我們能有效且準確地處理龐大的數據。

為什麼我們有這個角色
這個角色對於運用數據推動運營卓越和創新至關重要，特別是在醫療領域。隨著數據量的增長和分析的複雜性增加，我們需要技術精湛的工程師來管理和優化我們的數據系統。

如何獲得成功
成功的標誌在於您能夠設計並實施健全的數據系統，維持高質量和高可用性的數據，並能夠與跨職能團隊有效合作，以滿足他們的數據需求。

如何成長
您將有機會使用大數據領域的尖端技術，獲得持續的學習和發展，並參與推動公司戰略目標的重要項目。

主要職責
設計、建立和維護數據系統，以支持大數據存儲和分析。
開發和維護數據流程，以確保數據的品質和及時性。
協助各經營管理團隊，確保數據的可用性。
優化數據系統性能，並進行查詢優化。
與軟體工程師、業務部門合作，確保數據滿足需求。
負責數據安全和隱私，實施合適的數據保護措施。


我們希望您具備
熟悉 Python 、Scala 或 Node.js 任一種語言。
熟悉 SQL 語言。
熟悉任一種關聯式資料庫 (PostgreSQL、MySQL、MSSQL、Oracle 等)。
熟悉任一種 NoSQL (MongoDB、Cassandra 等)。
熟悉任一種 ETL 框架。
加分但非必要技能
熟悉任一種 Big Data 系統 (Spark、Hadoop 等)。
熟悉任一種 Machine learning framework (PyTorch、TensorFlow 等)。

About the Job
We focus on data analysis and application within our company, covering areas such as healthcare, sales, and finance. Our goal is to provide comprehensive operational direction, risk assessment, and value-added applications of software products to enhance the value of data utilization. We are currently looking for a professional Data Engineer to help drive innovation in the medical data field. You will be responsible for developing, maintaining, and optimizing our data infrastructure to ensure efficient and accurate processing of large datasets.

Why We Have This Role
This role is crucial for leveraging data to drive operational excellence and innovation, particularly in the healthcare sector. As data volumes grow and analytics become more complex, we need skilled engineers to manage and optimize our data systems.

How You'll Find Success
Success in this role will be measured by your ability to design and implement robust data systems, maintain high data quality and availability, and collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams to meet their data needs.

How You Grow
You will have opportunities to work with cutting-edge technologies in the big data field, engage in continuous learning and development, and contribute to impactful projects that drive the company’s strategic goals.

Things You Will Do
Design, build, and maintain data systems to support big data storage and analysis.
Develop and maintain data pipelines to ensure data quality and timeliness.
Assist various management teams to ensure data availability.
Optimize data system performance and perform query optimization.
Collaborate with software engineers and business departments to ensure data meets their needs.
Ensure data security and privacy by implementing appropriate data protection measures.

What We're Looking For on Your Resume
Proficiency in Python, Scala, or Node.js.
Strong knowledge of SQL.
Experience with relational databases (e.g., PostgreSQL, MySQL, MSSQL, Oracle).
Experience with NoSQL databases (e.g., MongoDB, Cassandra).
Familiarity with ETL frameworks.
Bonus Skills (Not Required)
Experience with big data systems (e.g., Spark, Hadoop).
Knowledge of machine learning frameworks (e.g., PyTorch, TensorFlow).

company: 緯創軟體股份有限公司
description:
我們正在尋找一位經驗豐富的 PowerBI 開發工程師加入團隊。在這個職位中，您將負責設計、開發和維護 PowerBI 解決方案，為業務部門提供可行的洞察分析。理想的候選人應具備強大的數據建模技能、儀表板設計經驗，以及能夠自動化流程以提高效率的能力。

【主要職責】
－PowerBI 開發與維護
• 根據業務部門需求設計和開發新的 PowerBI 儀表板和報表
• 維護現有儀表板，定期更新來自多個來源的數據，包括 LINE、WhatsApp、SFMC 和 Vimeo
• 創建和優化數據模型，確保報表效能
• 設計直觀的用戶界面，使數據易於利益相關者訪問
• 管理 PowerBI 環境中的用戶訪問權限和許可權
• 排查並解決業務部門報告的數據問題

－數據管理與分析
• 執行自定義數據分析，為業務部門提供可行的洞察
• 支援數據庫遷移項目，確保數據準確性和完整性
• 管理同意信息上傳至全球系統
• 通過定期更新密碼(90天更新週期)維護數據庫安全
• 處理來自各系統的臨時數據導出請求
• 根據業務部門定義的標準更新KPI追蹤報告

－流程自動化
• 開發和維護 Power Automate 流程以簡化業務流程
• 使用 Python 生成自動化的 Excel 模板
• 識別提高效率的一般自動化機會
• 創建從源系統到最終儀表板的端到端數據管道

－知識分享與支援
• 為新團隊成員舉辦關於使用本地/全球 PowerBI 儀表板的入職培訓
• 提供有關數據分析和 PowerBI 功能的研討會和培訓
• 與業務利益相關者合作，了解報告需求
• 記錄數據模型、流程和儀表板功能

【需求技能和條件】
• 在 PowerBI 方面的實證經驗，包括數據建模和 UI 設計
• 對 DAX 和 Power Query 的深入理解
• 使用 Power Automate 進行工作流程自動化的經驗
• 熟練掌握數據分析技術和方法
• 基本的 Python 腳本知識用於自動化任務
• 熟悉數據庫概念和 SQL
• 優秀的解決問題和故障排除能力
• 良好的溝通技巧，能有效進行知識分享和培訓
• 具備良好的人際交往能力，能有效地與終端用戶互動，理解他們的需求，並以非技術性的語言解釋技術概念
• 能夠清晰地用英語進行口頭和書面溝通 
• 有醫療保健或製藥數據經驗者優先

這個職位涉及以下混合工作方式：
• 定期的每週和每月例行任務
• 半年度報告週期
• 基於業務需求的臨時專案
• 與多個業務部門合作
-----------------------------------------------------------
We are seeking an experienced PowerBI Developer to join our team. In this role, you will be responsible for designing, developing, and maintaining PowerBI solutions that deliver actionable insights to business units. The ideal candidate will have strong data modeling skills, dashboard design experience, and the ability to automate processes to improve efficiency.

【Key Responsibilities】
－PowerBI Development and Maintenance
• Design and develop new PowerBI dashboards and reports based on business unit requirements
• Maintain existing dashboards with regular data updates from multiple sources including LINE, WhatsApp, SFMC, and Vimeo
• Create and optimize data models to ensure efficient reporting
• Design intuitive user interfaces that make data accessible to stakeholders
• Manage user access and permissions within the PowerBI environment
• Troubleshoot and resolve data issues reported by business units

－Data Management and Analysis
• Perform custom data analysis to provide actionable insights to business units
• Support database migration projects, ensuring data accuracy and integrity
• Manage consent information uploads to global systems 
• Maintain database security through regular password updates (90-day refresh cycle)
• Process ad-hoc data export requests from various systems
• Update KPI tracking reports based on business unit-defined criteria

－Process Automation
• Develop and maintain Power Automate flows to streamline business processes
• Generate automated Excel templates using Python 
• Identify opportunities for general automation to improve efficiency
• Create end-to-end data pipelines from source systems to final dashboards

【Required Skills and Qualifications】
• Proven experience with PowerBI, including data modeling and UI design
• Strong understanding of DAX and Power Query
• Experience with Power Automate for workflow automation
• Proficiency in data analysis techniques and methodologies
• Basic Python scripting knowledge for automation tasks
• Familiarity with database concepts and SQL
• Excellent problem-solving and troubleshooting abilities
• Strong communication skills for effective knowledge sharing and training
• Strong interpersonal skills to effectively interact with end users, understand their needs, and explain technical concepts in non-technical terms
• Able to communicate clearly in spoken and written English
• Experience working with healthcare or pharmaceutical data is a plus

This role involves a mix of:
• Regular weekly and monthly routine tasks
• Half-yearly reporting cycles
• Ad-hoc project work based on business needs
• Collaboration with multiple business units
The successful candidate will be able to manage recurring responsibilities while responding effectively to new requests and projects.

description:
[ 工作內容 ]
我們正在尋找對軟體開發充滿熱情的工程師，負責開發與維護工廠自動化派送系統，確保系統穩定運行並提升運作效率。本職位將與跨部門團隊合作，整合設備、資料庫與管理系統，為智慧製造提供高效解決方案。

[ 工作職責 ]
1. 開發與維護工廠自動化派送系統，優化系統效能與穩定性。
2. 設計與實作 Java 後端服務，包括 RESTful API，確保高效能與可擴展性。
3. 資料庫開發與優化，設計 SQL 查詢、索引調優，確保數據一致性與存取效率。
4. 系統架構設計，規劃模組化架構，提升可維護性與擴展性。
5. 跨部門協作，與設備工程師、IT 團隊合作，整合工業自動化設備與資訊系統。
6. 監控與除錯，分析系統日誌與效能監控，確保系統穩定運行，迅速解決問題。
7. 技術文件撰寫，記錄開發流程、系統架構與維護手冊，提升團隊協作效率。

[ 必備條件 ]
1. 具備 Java 開發經驗。
2. 熟悉 SQL 及資料庫設計，具備關聯式資料庫開發經驗。
3. 具備良好的 OOP (物件導向程式設計) 觀念，熟悉設計模式 (Design Patterns)。
4. 熟悉 Git 版本控制，具備團隊協作開發經驗。
5. 良好的問題分析與解決能力，能快速診斷系統異常並修復。
6. 樂於學習與探索新技術，對工業自動化領域有興趣。

[ 加分條件 ]
1. 具備 Spring Cloud、微服務架構 (Microservices) 開發經驗。
2. 具備 SECS 通訊經驗 (加分)。
3. 具備 單元測試 (Unit Testing) 經驗。
4. 具備 機器學習、AI 應用於工廠自動化 經驗。

[ 工作環境與文化 ]
1. 友善且完善的新進人員教育訓練。
2. 重視個人成長，提供內部技術分享與外部培訓機會。
3. 重視程式品質，定期進行 Code Review，提升系統可維護性與效能。

如果你熱愛開發高效穩定的系統，並希望將你的技術應用於智慧製造與工業 4.0，我們誠摯邀請你加入我們的團隊！
